email.subject: Your U.S. Vote Foundation Voter Account
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

U.S. Vote Foundation congratulates you on opening your new Voter Account. This will be the hub of your voting activity. You can login now using the following link: Access My Voter Account

Your Voter Account is a personal voting dashboard where you can access all the information you need to stay informed and take voting action. It’s designed to personalize and revitalize your voting experience.

Once you have logged into your Voter Account you will have instant access to:

  • Edit your profile and subscribe to Voter Alerts
  • Quick access to registration and absentee ballot request services
  • View your state election information on identification, eligibility and more
  • Your upcoming election dates and deadlines
  • Contact information for your local election officials
  • Access to our detailed FAQs and Voter Help Desk
  • Quick link to donate to the Foundation

...and many more features that make it easy to be an informed and engaged voter. We are excited to have you as a new Voter Account holder.

Please don’t hesitate to contact our Voter Help Desk with any questions you may have!

And don’t forget – US Vote is a nonpartisan, nonprofit, public charity. You are what makes it possible for US Vote to continue to provide these services. Please give back with a donation.

Thank you, and happy voting!

Your U.S. Vote Foundation Team
